roleset.name: eat, use up, devouring

example.name: consume-v: active
example.text: The Miami fast - food chain , owned by Grand Metropolitan of Britain , expects to consume roughly 34 million pounds of liquefied eggs annually .

propbank.arg: The Miami fast - food chain , owned by Grand Metropolitan of Britain
roughly 34 million pounds of liquefied eggs

example.name: consume-v: passive, odd agent
example.text: While the vast bulk of it was indeed spent by reputable organizations on the good works it was raised for , it 's equally true that a sizable hunk was consumed in `` expenses '' claimed by other operators , including fraudulent expenses .

propbank.arg: in `` expenses '' claimed by other operators , including fraudulent expenses

example.name: consuming-j: concatenation of arg0
example.text: I too would buy a lace front wig if I did it but they 're so damn expensive and time consuming to put on .

example.name: consuming-j
example.text: I do n't know . I 'm like not even thinking about my class content , this is all consuming

example.name: consuming-n
example.text: At the same time , green living and green consuming are necessary to reduce PM2.5 concentration , such as improving automobile fuel oil quality , greatly developing transit transportation and new energy automobiles , guide people to take green transportation , etc .

propbank.arg: such as improving automobile fuel oil quality , greatly developing transit transportation and new energy automobiles , guide people to take green transportation , etc

example.name: consumption-n: Arg1 only, pre-relation position
example.text: Sugar consumption is off the charts lately .

example.name: consumption-n: Arg 1 as "of" PP
example.text: The consumption of the world 's oil supply will have disastrous consequences .

example.name: consumption-n: Arg 0 only, pre-relational position
example.text: Some fish are not safe for human consumption .

example.name: consumption-n: All arguments
example.text: As chidren 's body weights have increased , so has their consumption of fast foods and soft drinks .

propbank.arg: of fast foods and soft drinks

roleset.note: CONSUME-V NOTES: Frames file for 'consume' based on financial subcorpus; adjectival 'consuming' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of VNcls devour-39.4-1, consume-66. (from consume.01-v)
CONSUMPTION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry consume.01, OntoNotes grouping consumption senses 1-3; maps to VN classes devour-39.4-1 & consume-66. Framed by Claire. (from consumption.01-n)
CONSUMING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from consuming.01-j)
CONSUMING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from consuming.01-n)
